page.title: 07THE FLOWER FESTIVAL
page.content: Each year Donington church holds a Flower Festival. This is timed to coincide with the main Flower Festival Parade in Spalding. Bulb growing is an important part of our agriculture. When the tulip heads are removed to allow the bulbs to develop they are used to decorate large floats. The flower parade attracts thousands of visitors into the area. Donington church is decorated with flowers and our school makes a flower carpet using tulip heads. We have enclosed a photograph of this.
